metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31676 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: VMware Tools (12.0.0, 11.x.y and 10.x.y) contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability. A malicious actor with local non-administrative access to the Guest OS can escalate privileges as a root user in the virtual machine.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Patch in email with Message-ID <BYAPR05MB634348FE28845A7AF442BE28B9649@BYAPR05MB6343.namprd05.prod.outlook.com>

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
